|history={{THA}} }} Faker has won 3 [[World Championship]]s ([[World Championship/2013|2013]], [[World Championship/2015|2015]], [[World Championship/2016|2016]]) and 2 [[Mid-Season Invitational]]s ([[Mid-Season Invitational/2016|2016]], [[Mid-Season Invitational/2017|2017]]), and has 10 combined [[LCK]] and [[Champions|Champions Korea]] titles. He is sometimes referred to as "The Unkillable Demon King" by Korean fans.{{cite web | url = https://www.theplayerstribune.com/articles/faker-league-of-legends-worlds-unkillable | title = Unkillable | author = [[Faker]] | date = 2016-10-28 | publisher = [https://www.theplayerstribune.com The Players' Tribune] | accessdate = 2021-10-03 }} ==Achievements== {{player achievements table|player=Faker}}
